explains: vt. 使失去勇气；使身心交疲；使焦躁；使失常

sentences.en: He hoped to unnerve Kennedy and force him into concessions.
sentences.cn: 他只希望动摇肯尼迪的信念，迫使他让步。

sentences.en: Unnerve guest users by adding the roving eyes that follow mouse movements.
sentences.cn: 给来宾帐户添加“跟随眼睛”这个跟随鼠标移动的工具可以着实吓人一跳。

sentences.en: In fact, their confidence and assertiveness tends to unnerve my older male colleagues.
sentences.cn: 实际上，她们的自信和魄力使年长的男性同行们倍感压力。
